lyric:
[00:01.64]We could talk for hours
[00:06.87]It doesn't matter
[00:10.20]You don't hear a word
[00:11.88]I say 'Cause you don't listen when
[00:16.93]I speak So
[00:19.24]I'll sing instead
[00:25.99]La la la la la
[00:28.50]I love you
[00:31.80]Ooh I really do
[00:38.50]If you ever paid attention
[00:43.93]I think you would love me too
[00:53.77]You say you want to know me
[00:59.08]I get the feeling that you're telling me a lie
[01:06.52]Cause every time
[01:08.42]I talk about emotion
[01:12.30]You shake your pretty head and say goodbye
[01:18.67]La la la la la
[01:20.63]I love you
[01:25.06]Ooh I really do
[01:31.23]If you ever paid attention
[01:36.72]I think you would love me too
[01:42.76]Why do I love you like
[01:44.94]I do When you ignore me
[01:48.83]Just like the sun ignores the moon
[01:55.75]All you see is you
[02:01.23]I love you
[02:05.31]Ooh sad but true
[02:11.39]If you ever paid attention
[02:16.66]I think you would love me too
tlyric:
[by:KOWTEN]
[ti:You Would Love Me Too]
[ar:JJ Heller]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:01.64]漫漫长谈
[00:06.87]没关系
[00:10.20]你根本就没心思理会
[00:11.88]我说那是因为你没有听
[00:16.93]我说
[00:19.24]我宁愿唱出来
[00:25.99]啦啦啦啦啦
[00:28.50]我爱你
[00:31.80]哦噢我是认真的
[00:38.50]假如你曾经注意到
[00:43.93]我想你也会爱我
[00:53.77]你说你想了解我
[00:59.08]'我的直觉告诉我你在撒谎
[01:06.52]因为每次
[01:08.42]谈及感情
[01:12.30]你摇头，说不
[01:18.67]啦啦啦啦啦
[01:20.63]我爱你
[01:25.06]哦噢我是认真的
[01:31.23]假如你曾经注意到
[01:36.72]我想你也会爱我
[01:42.76]为什么我仍然爱着你
[01:44.94]你却无视我爱你
[01:48.83]这犹如太阳不理会月亮
[01:55.75]你所看到的都是你
[02:01.23]我爱你
[02:05.31]哦噢，伤感但真实
[02:11.39]假如你曾经注意到
[02:16.66]我想你也会爱我
